p: Herpes zoster usually develops in patients with compromised immune function. Patients on dialysis are at high risk of Herpes zoster. Both valacyclovir and acyclovir are considered to have strong inhibitory effects on types 1 and 2 herpes virus and varicella herpes virus[ 12]. Valacyclovir is a precursor of acyclovir, which is converted to acyclovir by the liver. Compared with acyclovir, it has the advantages of higher absorption rate, more better pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics, and lower frequency of use[ 5].
